description:
Matou Byakuya is the elder brother of http://anidb.net/ch25943 [Matou Kariya] and the father of http://anidb.net/ch1914 [Matou Shinji].
Although he is http://anidb.net/ch37277 [Matou Zouken]`s elder son, he is unfit to be the family heir, because he has very few Magic Circuits, and is considered a failure. Therefore, Kariya was supposed to inherit the position of family head, but he severed ties with the Matou out of disgust.
Some years after Kariya left, Byakuya would eventually meet and marry a woman with the proper traits to give birth to a child more suited to be a magus, but this child, Shinji, was only marginally better. For that reason, he was considered even more of a failure. At the time the events of the http://anidb.net/a8160 [first] and http://anidb.net/a8880 [second] seasons of Fate/Zero take place, he is already a broken, depressed alcoholic. Since Shinji wasn`t good enough to inherit the family either, Zouken adopted Sakura into the family, and placed Byakuya in charge of supervising her worm "training".
name: Matou Byakuya
